name: Remy Russell
productManagement: Ensure success of the business and customers
Understand the customer and user experience to anticipate potential opportunities
Use quantitative and qualitative analysis to discover problems worth solving
Inspire cross-functional collaboration to design and develop valuable product features
Prioritize tasks for the engineers and partner with internal stakeholders to align on strategy

professionalExperience.description: Leadership transitioned my role to the engineering team to leverage my technical skills and enthusiasm about our new integration implementations. I’ve since helped to shape Eccovia’s API product and solution designs to empower our customers in the Health and Human Services industry to serve their clients.
highlights: Onboarded strategic customer partners that were interested in leveraging Eccovia’s new API and worked with external developers to understand their experience throughout implementation
Elicited developer and customer feedback to inspire additional API end points and features
Analyzed APIs and integration specifications to define technical requirements for internal engineering resources
Lead integration implementations as a BA for over ten customer organizations and managed relationships with their integration partners
Established a consistent approach across new integrations solutions and transitioned three previously-implemented customer integrations to our new integration framework
Drove successful implementations for two of Eccovia’s largest new customers
Provided demonstrations and trainings to stakeholders and end users and worked with them throughout design, feedback, and testing sessions to iterate on the solution
Lead technical requirement elicitations to map data from legacy relational databases and integration partner sources while designing new destination schema for our solutions

education.degree: BSE in Industrial & Operations Engineering, Certificate in Entrepreneurship 2015

skills: Integrations and data migrations, RESTful APIs, JSON, XML, Flat files
SQL (primarily querying) and basic understanding of Javascript, HTML, C++, MATLAB, VB
HL7 fundamentals (v2.x and FHIR) and experience implementing v2.x ADT and CDA integrations
fun: Music (EDM software production, guitar, drums, piano)
